lead_paragraph: Thousands of soldiers and officers were purged from the military as the government of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan sought to assert control.

byline.contributor: Safak Timur and Karam Shoumali contributed reporting.
byline.original: By TIM ARANGO and CEYLAN YEGINSU

headline.print_headline: Turkey Cracks Down as Coup Unravels
headline.main: As Turkey Coup Unfolded, ‘the Whole Night Felt Like Doomsday’

snippet: Thousands of soldiers and officers were purged from the military as the government of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan sought to assert control....
abstract: Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan, seeking to regain control hours after military coup attempt, vows to punish coup's perpetrators; officials begin rounding up thousands of participant soldiers and officers in purge that is likely to be ongoing.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
